mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (board_id, user_id, parent_id, line_number, content, like_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{lineNumber}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.board_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.line_number, c.content, c.like_count, c.created_at, c.updated_at, u.username as author_name FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.board_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.line_number, c.content, c.like_count, c.created_at, c.updated_at, u.username as author_name FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.id, c.board_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.line_number, c.content, c.like_count, c.created_at, c.updated_at, u.username as author_name FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} AND c.line_number = #{lineNumber} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET like_count = #{likeCount} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
